publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1989 Helen Eadie: Superfast Receives Best Ferry Award—That the Parliament notes the ongoing success story of the passenger and freight Superfast ferry service operating from Fife with its record levels of sea freight transport; congratulates Yannis Criticos, Superfast board member and project director of North Sea and Superfast Ferries on being voted Best Ferry Operator by the Scottish Passenger Agents’ Association (SPAA), which is the oldest travel trade association in the world, established in 1921, and further notes that around 700 travel agents in Scotland associated with the SPAA voted for the award and that Superfast held off competition from Stena Line, SeaCat, DFDS Seaways and P&O Ferries to scoop the top award.

S2M-1989 Superfast Receives Best Ferry Award (lodged on 10 November 2004) Christine May*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Nora Radcliffe*, Tricia Marwick*, Sarah Boyack*, Murdo Fraser*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mike Pringle*, Jackie Baillie*, Scott Barrie*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*

S2M-1989 Helen Eadie: Superfast Receives Best Ferry Award—That the Parliament notes the ongoing success story of the passenger and freight Superfast ferry service operating from Fife with its record levels of sea freight transport; congratulates Yannis Criticos, Superfast board member and project director of North Sea and Superfast Ferries on being voted Best Ferry Operator by the Scottish Passenger Agents’ Association (SPAA), which is the oldest travel trade association in the world, established in 1921, and further notes that around 700 travel agents in Scotland associated with the SPAA voted for the award and that Superfast held off competition from Stena Line, SeaCat, DFDS Seaways and P&O Ferries to scoop the top award. Supported by: Christine May, Marilyn Livingstone, Nora Radcliffe, Tricia Marwick, Sarah Boyack, Murdo Fraser, Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mike Pringle, Jackie Baillie, Scott Barrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Phil Gallie*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1989 Superfast Receives Best Ferry Award (lodged on 10 November 2004) Chris Ballance*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-1989 Superfast Receives Best Ferry Award (lodged on 10 November 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-1989 Superfast Receives Best Ferry Award (lodged on 10 November 2004) Maureen Macmillan*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1989 Superfast Receives Best Ferry Award (lodged on 10 November 2004) Cathy Peattie*
